Description:
The Euro Truck Simulator 2 gives you the experience of managing the most powerful cars ever to appear
on highways and motorways highways of Europe.You can go all the way - From the enthusiast-truck driver,to
the owner of its own transportation empire. Customize trucks from scratch,as expand your fleet, hire drivers,
buy a garage in every town and research blow every way - And that's only part of the available options.

Features:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Here is the whole of Europe - From the UK to Poland.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Always place all kinds of goods in more than 60 cities.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Reproduced thousands of miles of real road network - With hundreds of famous sights.
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Expanding opportunities for tuning and styling trucks - From increased productivity to replacement headlights, hooters & exhaust pipes.

Installation:

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Typical Installation:
1. Install the game by running "Setup.exe".
2. Copy the contents of the folder Crack into the game folder.
3. Play.

Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Installing via Steam Client: (Only for holders of a license key)
Warning! Before installing a Steam client, the game should already be registered to your account, and Steam client - closed.
Automatic Installation:
1. Run the file "SteamInstallHelper.exe".
2. Follow the instructions.
3. Play.
Manual Installation:
1. Run "Setup.exe".
2. Install the game in Steam client folder (* folder with the Steam client * steamappscommonEuro Truck Simulator 2)
3. Copy the entire contents of the "Depot" in the root folder of the Steam client. 
4. Play.
* Way to install the game should look like this: C:Program FilesSteamsteamappscommonEuro Truck Simulator 2
